channel.title: 2 Kings on Follow me and I shall make you fishers of men.
channel.description: Recent content in 2 Kings on Follow me and I shall make you fishers of men.

item.title: 2 Kings 5:1-15
item.description: 1 Now Naaman, captain of the host of the king of Syria, was a great man with his master, and honourable, because by him the LORD had given deliverance unto Syria: he was also a mighty man in valour, but he was a leper. 2 And the Syrians had gone out by companies, and had brought away captive out of the land of Israel a little maid; and she waited on Naamanâ€™s wife.
